column2: Hello my name is Player_Child, Nice to meet you.
Hello Player_Child, my name is Sistine
I am a freelancer. Call me whatever you want if you need something.
Anyway, do you like art class ?
I think I must go now see you.
I think she is a nice person.
I don't have interest with art.
Oh I am sorry about it.
I think I must go now see you.
I think she is a nice person.
